content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great place to live, given its prime location and modern amenities. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student so I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping for something around 350 euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. The location and quality of this apartment justify a higher rent. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can go higher. But I'm still on a tight budget, so let's say 450 euros a month. It's a fair price for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 450 euros is still below my expectations for this apartment. It's a new construction in the city center, close to all amenities. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. Would you consider going higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. How about 500 euros a month? It's a reasonable price for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 euros is more in the right direction, but I'm still looking for a price that compensates me for the investment I've made in this property. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can go higher. How about 550 euros a month? I think it's a fair price for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 550 euros is getting closer to what I'm looking for, but I'd like to push for a bit more. Would you be willing to go up to 600 euros a month? It's the lowest I'd be willing to accept for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I appreciate the negotiation. I agree to the price of 600 euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 600 euros a month! Let's proceed with the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment, Yi-Nuo. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Is there anything else you need to discuss before we move forward?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. That's all for now. I'm really looking forward to moving in.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. We'll get the paperwork sorted out and you can start enjoying your new home soon. Is there anything specific you need in the apartment? Perhaps some furniture or appliances? I can try to accommodate your needs if possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer, but I'll take care of that on my own. I appreciate your help, but I'd like to handle the furniture and appliances myself.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: No problem, Yi-Nuo. Self-procured furniture can give the apartment a personal touch. Just let me know if you need any assistance with the move-in process or if there's anything else I can help you with. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your help and understanding. I'm looking forward to moving in and making this place my home.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm here to assist you in any way I can. If you have any questions or need help with anything, please don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
